title: ðŸ†• âœ¨If my mom wakes me up, will saying the Dhikr & Dua immediately still count, or affect acceptance?
transcript: San from Bangladesh Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh Wa Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu I hope you're doing fantastic Sheikh Alhamdulillah Rabbil Alameen My question was we know there's a specific zikr that we say when we wake up for night prayers and when we say this zikr and make dua afterwards our what's the call supplication gets answered by Allah my question is I sometimes uh what's the call struggle to wake up so if I tell my brother to wake me up and immediately without talking with him he reminds me that what's it called to say the zikr and then make dua will that count yes it will count inshallah and this is totally acceptable
